name: Overlay
description: Shared overlay handler/manager utilities and helpers.

use: you need a centralized overlay manager for popovers, tooltips, and menus.
you want access to overlay handlers and popover primitives.
avoid: the widget already provides its own overlay behavior.

theming: Uses `Theme.of(context)` for surface tokens in popover widgets.
accessibility: Ensure overlays can be dismissed via keyboard and tap outside.
do: Wrap your app with `ShadcnLayer` or `OverlayManagerLayer` once.
dont: Stack multiple overlay managers for the same subtree.
